data.name: Discouraged Workers - Extras
data.detailed_description:
Follow US


About the Game

  • Extras Vol.1 - Disc Labels
  • Extras Vol.2 - SNS Avatars
  • Extras Vol.3 - Wallpapers
  • Extras Vol.4 - Android APK

Description

  • Extras Vol.1 - Formtec 16mm&40mm Label DGO, LightScribe Label LSL
  • Extras Vol.2 - 512px Avatar Icons(you can use it for your SNS avatar)
  • Extras Vol.3 - 1920x1080 FHD Wallpapers(same as the Steam Profile Backgrounds)
  • Extras Vol.4 - Android APK(only included in the extras of PC versions)

Credits


Lee Yunseok: Directing, Design, Programming, Music, Sound, Writing, UI Design, Backgournd CGs, Object sprites, Packaging, Movie, Website -From April 21, 2013
Ga Younghee: English translation -From April 11, 2015
Brian Connors: Translation Adviser -June 3, 2015~September 30, 2015
YANG: Male sprites, CG sprites -April 8, 2015~September 13, 2015
Adam Patric Kratz: Epilepsy Adviser -November 15, 2015~November 20, 2015

chibilis studio: Female sprites, CG sprite-Eternal Happiness -March 10, 2015~April 6, 2015
Kyle Fawcett: Demo Translation Adviser -June 3, 2015~June 14, 2015
Jeon Junsik: Unofficial demo sprites -January 5, 2015~February 25, 2015

Thank You Letter


ACOC, Aiman Sharul, Axel Mertes, Bgame, Brandon Tanimoto, Brian Connors,
BRISAK Kim Doohyeon, cheif.choi, Choi Irang, Choi Jihye, clôture, Danielle Bell,
Edward N Puckering, Gary King, Gwak Jaeryeol, Han Ihyeong, Hoe Namyoon,
Hong Eunki, Hwang Daehoon, Hyojoon, James Emmerson, Jeong Dongwon,
Jeong Wookjin, Jeong Yoonsoo, Jianmin Zhang, Karina Schulze, Keira Val'Azr,
Kim Hanseol, Kim Hyeoncheol, Kim Jaeseong, Kim Jeongwoong, Kim Myeongwook,
Lee Changki, Lee Eunji, Lee Gunhae, Lee Hyejin, Lee Jaewi, Light Twins, Lim Jisoo,
Maddy Wootton, Marshall Proudfoot, Mirumu, Mojaeng, Oh Hyeonjun, Park Hyeonjun,
Park JoonKoo, Rewind, Sander Tieleman, srwss, Sung Chanaul, YottaCho, Zerial.net

Christopher Rice, George Winston, Kim Sooyoung, Lee Illseong, Pixabay, Shin Haechul,
So Reyeon, Tom Rothamel, Valve Corporation

This game was created by you. Yours Sincerely,
Lee Yunseok, Creator of YGGDRASIL STUDIO.

data.short_description: Discouraged Workers purchase exclusive DLC. Discouraged Workers Extras contains useful items. This DLC can be purchased free of charge. Thank you for purchased the Discouraged Workers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP x86
  • Processor: Pentium 4 1.66 GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX compatible card
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible card
  • Additional Notes: Android 2.3.3(Gingerbread), WVGA(800*480 16:9 Wide Screen)
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP x86, Vista or 7 or higher
  • Processor: Pentium 4 2.1 GHz or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Android 4.0(Ice Cream Sandwich) or higher, FHD(1920*1080 16:9 Wide Screen) or higher, LightScribe ODD, Formtec Design Pro, Adobe Acrobat Reader 5.0 or higher

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6.3 Snow Leopard x86
  • Processor: Intel processor (IA-32)
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Android 2.3.3(Gingerbread), WVGA(800*480 16:9 Wide Screen)
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6.3 Snow Leopard x64 or higher
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo Yonah processor or higher
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Android 4.0(Ice Cream Sandwich) or higher, FHD(1920*1080 16:9 Wide Screen) or higher, LightScribe ODD

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux x86
  • Processor: Intel Celeron 700 MHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 260 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Android 2.3.3(Gingerbread), WVGA(800*480 16:9 Wide Screen)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SteamOS 2.20 Brewmaster, Ubuntu 12.04 LTS Precise Pangolin x64 or higher
  • Processor: Intel or AMD 64-bit capable processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA graphics card
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Android 4.0(Ice Cream Sandwich) or higher, FHD(1920*1080 16:9 Wide Screen) or higher, LightScribe ODD, 3-Heights™ PDF Optimization Shell
